picks.text: The iPhone 16 Pro gains a 5x zoom
picks.full-pick-text: The iPhone 16 Pro gains a 5x zoom

picks.text: All the iPhones announced support Apple Intelligence
picks.full-pick-text: All the iPhones announced support Apple Intelligence

picks.text: Apple introduces a faster chip for the iPhone
picks.full-pick-text: Apple introduces a faster chip for the iPhone
picks.notes:
• Was originally "The Pro iPhones increase in size" but Stephen argued that his round 2 pick pre-empted this one because he drafts first as the previous winner, and the first two rounds are "equal."
  • Ungraded, Myke thinks the chip name may include "AI".

picks.text: The screen on the iPhone 16 Pro Max will increase to at least 6.9 inches
picks.full-pick-text: The screen on the iPhone 16 Pro Max will increase to at least 6.9 inches
picks.notes: • A new competitor enters the game with a boldly specific pick for the first round... and also no sourcing for its "thinking."

picks.text: The iPhone 16 and 16 Pro are larger than their predecessors
picks.full-pick-text: The iPhone 16 and 16 Pro are larger than their predecessors
picks.notes: • Stephen meant "Pro" and "Pro Max", but no one caught what he had actually written.

picks.text: Apple debuts new AirPods model
picks.full-pick-text: Apple debuts new AirPods model

picks.text: A button is introduced to an iPhone that directly lets you capture photos
picks.full-pick-text: A button is introduced to an iPhone that directly lets you capture photos

picks.text: The iPhone 16 lineup will introduce a new under-display FaceID system, removing the notch or Dynamic Island
picks.full-pick-text: The iPhone 16 lineup will introduce a new under-display FaceID system, removing the notch or Dynamic Island

picks.text: The iPad mini is updated with an A17 Pro or higher and a larger, brighter display. It will run Apple Intelligence.
picks.full-pick-text: The iPad mini is updated with an A17 Pro or higher and a larger, brighter display. It will run Apple Intelligence.

picks.text: The new Capture button...
picks.full-pick-text: The new Capture button: Supports at least two user-configurable gestures, Will support third-party camera apps in addition to the system camera, Will integrate with the Controls API to configure various commands
picks.notes:
• "Supports at least two user-configurable gestures"
  • "Will support third-party camera apps in addition to the system camera"
  • "Will integrate with the Controls API to configure various commands"

picks.text: Apple specifically mention RAM/Memory in the iPhone, say it will be at least 8GB, and state it is to power Apple Intelligence
picks.full-pick-text: Apple specifically mention RAM/Memory in the iPhone, say it will be at least 8GB, and state it is to power Apple Intelligence
picks.notes: • This pick triggered some confusion about the new three-condition risky pick rules, and it got a bit heated. But ultimately the rules were revised to clarify that the risky pick is the three conditions, and doesn't need an additional overarching pick.

picks.text: Apple introduces a new telephoto lens to the Pro Max that has...
picks.full-pick-text: Apple introduces a new telephoto lens to the Pro Max that has 10x zoom, It will feature enhanced low light performance that is branded NightSight Pro, and it will include a new sensor-shift stabilization system
picks.notes:
• "10x zoom"
  • "It will feature enhanced low light performance that is branded NightSight Pro"
  • "and it will include a new sensor-shift stabilization system."

picks.full-pick-text: There are multiple AirPods models

picks.notes: • An intentionally subjective pick that's testing how a vibes-based pick could work out. "The vibe is the colours are better."

picks.full-pick-text: iPhone 16 and 16 Pro can run Apple Intelligence
